alert.note: Alert for South Central Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued May 05 at 2:39PM PDT until May 05 at 9:00PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Northern Elko County, Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range, Southwest Elko County and South Central Elko County. * WHEN...From 11 AM to 9 PM PDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Blowing dust could reduce visibility down to a mile or less making travel difficult at times. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing dust is expected alongside these strong winds. Look for visibility to be greatly reduce at times, especially around the I-80 corridor.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
